Articles.Content:
Something cool I would like to see in Kerbal Space Program is...

...BOATS!!! You might be able to make an aircraft carrier, a rover storage, cruise ship, anything.

closed in, 3...2...1

well, maybe not, I'm not a mod.

been suggested alot and is probally on the what not to suggest.

This is suggested pretty much every week.

I'd like the feature but probably post 1.0
Well, this is probably a stupid thread anyways. I saw a guys Youtube video, and he made a boat. Got it into the water using the runaway.

BOATS!!! You might be able to make an aircraft carrier, a rover storage, cruise ship, anything.

A boat as an aircraft carrier? Really? I'd like to see that.

FYI the informal definition of a boat is "a ship that is small enough to be casually carried onboard of another ship" (the term "casually" is used to preemptively squash the "yeah but you can put it on a heavy-lift semi submersible" retort)

An aircraft carrier is a ship, not a boat.

But it would be nice to have a vehicle to recover splashed down capsules.

A boat as an aircraft carrier? Really? I'd like to see that.

FYI the informal definition of a boat is "a ship that is small enough to be casually carried onboard of another ship" (the term "casually" is used to preemptively squash the "yeah but you can put it on a heavy-lift semi submersible" retort)

An aircraft carrier is a ship, not a boat.

But it would be nice to have a vehicle to recover splashed down capsules.

This is Kerbal Space Program. I wouldn't be surprised if the aircraft carrier carrier was also a boat.
Boat? Its called a SPACE Program, not a Water Program...
Also, this has been overly suggested. Seriously. On that note, never mention multiplayer and you'll have plenty of fun times here.
Sorry, it's an aerospace flight simulator, not a marine-adventure-whatever. I apologize if I am smashing your hopes and dreams, but just download the mods for it.
The OP himself already started a thread covering the same topic a couple of weeks ago.
